General.Name: Monami
General.Description: Monami Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stationery products in South Korea and internationally. The company offers pens, pencil, markers, highlighters, and artist's materials, as well as miscellaneous, such as eraser, glue stick, white clean, correction tape, and white board cleaner. Monami Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Yongin-Si, South Korea.

1.Name: Song   Ha-Kyung
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Gen. Director
